frontmatter.title: Bug Zero
frontmatter.description: Bug Zero is the only and the biggest bug bounty platform in Sri Lanka. Bug Zero came into play as a result of a collaboration between ScoreLab (University of Colombo School of Computing - UCSC) and BLUES (UC Berkeley - USA). Bug Zero provides an array of services and products centred around improving the security and privacy posture of organizations. Everything Bug Zero provides is based on empirical research conducted by UCSC and collaborative institutions.
